note: GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Per capita plastic waste vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Per capita plastic waste generation rate is measured in kilograms per person per day. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.
sourceDesc: Jambeck, et al. (2015); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank (2025)
